welcome_message_body: Convert song notes to harmonica tabs and manage your songs.
howto_title: Enter song notes in the chat to convert them to harmonica tabs. Use the /add command to create and save a new song.
could_not_find_song_message:
Could not find song. Please provide a name or index.

Type /list to get a list of your songs, /add to create a new one or /help for help.
command_howto: How to convert song notes to tabs
rejected_song_deleted: Failed to delete PLACEHOLDER: Only the creator of a song can delete it.
add_song_title: Please enter a song title (type 'c' to cancel):
add_song_abcnotation_url: Please provide the URL of the abcnotation.com song (type 'c' to cancel):
add_song_enter_tabs: Please enter now the tabs (type 'c' to cancel):
add_song_enter_notes: Please enter now the notes (type 'h' for help or 'c' to cancel):
add_song_help:
Please enter notes using the Middle C (C4 or câ€²) as base for the octave notation. If a note is below the Middle C, it needs to specify 0 as octave. Everything starting at the High C (C5 or câ€²â€²) needs to specify a 2 as octave.

Notes must be separated by spaces. Special characters can be used for formatting (e.g., bar line with '|' or new line).

Example with Drunken Sailor:
